target.description: Set the JavaScript language version for emitted JavaScript and include compatible library declarations.

module.description: Specify what module code is generated.

lib.description: Specify a set of bundled library declaration files that describe the target runtime environment.

jsx.description: Specify what JSX code is generated.

outDir.description: Specify an output folder for all emitted files.

rootDir.description: Specify the root folder within your source files.

strict.description: Enable all strict type-checking options. Recommended for all projects.

noImplicitAny.description: Enable error reporting for expressions and declarations with an implied 'any' type.

strictNullChecks.description: When type checking, take into account 'null' and 'undefined'.

strictFunctionTypes.description: When assigning functions, check to ensure parameters and the return values are subtype-compatible.

strictBindCallApply.description: Check that the arguments for 'bind', 'call', and 'apply' methods match the original function.

strictPropertyInitialization.description: Check for class properties that are declared but not set in the constructor.

noImplicitThis.description: Enable error reporting when 'this' is given the type 'any'.

noUnusedLocals.description: Enable error reporting when local variables aren't read.

noUnusedParameters.description: Raise an error when a function parameter isn't read.

noImplicitReturns.description: Enable error reporting for codepaths that do not explicitly return in a function.

noFallthroughCasesInSwitch.description: Enable error reporting for fallthrough cases in switch statements.

esModuleInterop.description: Emit additional JavaScript to ease support for importing CommonJS modules. This enables 'allowSyntheticDefaultImports' for type compatibility.

allowSyntheticDefaultImports.description: Allow 'import x from y' when a module doesn't have a default export.

skipLibCheck.description: Skip type checking all .d.ts files. Speeds up compilation significantly.

forceConsistentCasingInFileNames.description: Ensure that casing is correct in imports. Important for case-sensitive file systems.

declaration.description: Generate .d.ts files from TypeScript and JavaScript files in your project.

sourceMap.description: Create source map files for emitted JavaScript files.

removeComments.description: Disable emitting comments in compiled output.

noEmit.description: Disable emitting files from a compilation. Useful for type-checking only.

importHelpers.description: Allow importing helper functions from tslib once per project, instead of including them per-file.

downlevelIteration.description: Emit more compliant, but verbose and less performant JavaScript for iteration.

isolatedModules.description: Ensure that each file can be safely transpiled without relying on other imports. Required for Babel, SWC, and Vite.

allowJs.description: Allow JavaScript files to be a part of your program. Use the 'checkJS' option to get errors from these files.

checkJs.description: Enable error reporting in type-checked JavaScript files.

moduleResolution.description: Specify how TypeScript looks up a file from a given module specifier.

baseUrl.description: Specify the base directory to resolve non-relative module names.

paths.description: Specify a set of entries that re-map imports to additional lookup locations.

types.description: Specify type package names to be included without being referenced in a source file.

allowImportingTsExtensions.description: Allow imports to include TypeScript file extensions (.ts, .tsx, .mts, .cts).

incremental.description: Save .tsbuildinfo files to allow for incremental compilation of projects.

composite.description: Enable constraints that allow a TypeScript project to be used with project references.

include.description: Specifies an array of filenames or patterns to include in the program.

exclude.description: Specifies an array of filenames or patterns that should be skipped when resolving include.

extends.description: Path to base configuration file to inherit from.

files.description: Specifies an allowlist of files to include in the program.
